statements: SELECT * FROM online_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_amount FROM online_sales WHERE sale_id = 100
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM online_sales WHERE sale_amount > 500
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM online_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM online_sales ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM online_sales WHERE sale_id = 100
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM online_sales WHERE sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM online_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_amount FROM online_sales
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_amount FROM online_sales
SELECT * FROM online_sales;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM online_sales ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, purchase_amount, transaction_date FROM online_sales WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue;
SELECT revenue_id, total_revenue FROM revenue WHERE total_revenue < 5000 ORDER BY revenue_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM online_sales ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM online_sales WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, transaction_date FROM online_sales WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM online_sales GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM online_sales WHERE transaction_date = (SELECT MAX(transaction_date) FROM online_sales);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price >= 10.00 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) as order_count FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING order_count >= 5
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) as total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM sales_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM sales_orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM sales_orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM sales_orders JOIN order_items ON sales_orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, od.quantity, p.price, p.price * od.quantity AS total_price FROM products p JOIN order_details od ON p.product_id = od.product_id WHERE od.order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
